talks.title: Android Worldwide: Mobile Application Monitoring 101
talks.description: An intro to Mobile Application Monitoring and all of its aspects, and how you can use Sentry to monitor your mobile apps.

talks.title: GitHub Open Source Friday: Build Your Own Design System with Chakra UI
talks.description: Watch Lazar Nikolov (DevRel and Core Maintainer at Chakra UI) and Segun Adebayo (creator of Chakra UI) demonstrate how to leverage Chakra UI to build a design system and override components in Chakra UI.

talks.title: Intro to building UI Machines with Zag.js (English)
talks.description: I gave a talk on building UI Machines with Zag.js at the DevCon conference in Skopje. This one is in English.

talks.title: Intro to building UI Machines with Zag.js (Macedonian)
talks.description: I gave a talk on building UI Machines with Zag.js at the BeerJS meetup in Skopje. The talk is in Macedonian.

talks.title: Redwood.js Launch Week: Partner Office Hours
talks.description: Esther and I gave a demo of the Chakra UI + Redwood.js integration at Redwood's Launch Week: Partner Office Hours event.

talks.title: React Finland - Vodcast 5 - Design tools
talks.description: In the fifth React Finland Vodcast, we'll cover design tools with Laura JÃ¤rvinen, Margarita Roi, and Lazar Nikolov.

talks.title: Frontend.horse: Building Layouts Fast with Chakra UI
talks.description: In this episode, we'll learn how to use Chakra UI to build pages with robust and customizable components!
